title: A psalme of thankes-giuing, to [be sung] by the children of Christs hospitall, on Munday in the Holy-dayes, at Saint Maries Spittle, for their founders and benefactors. Anno Domini. 1634
author: Christ's Hospital (London, England)
publisher: By E. Allde, dwelling neere Christ-Church,
notes: Chorus begins: "Rise orphanes, raise your voyce, ..".
Imperfect; torn at upper right corner affecting title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
